bug_report.Issue_title: When adding a Photos Library.photoslibrary file to a photo, an error 500 occurs
bug_report.Issue_description: When trying to pull the Photos Library.photoslibrary file into the photo, an error 500 (Internal Server Error) occurs

Steps_to_reduce.step_3: 3. Click on the button "+" in the window Photo

bug_report.Expected_result: Notification 'Invalid file type or maximum file size exceeded'
